title: If You Want To Get Great At Making Money, Then You Need To Be A Copy Closer With Carlos Redlich
itunes:title: If You Want To Get Great At Making Money, Then You Need To Be A Copy Closer With Carlos Redlich
description:
Carlos Redlich is a seasoned copywriter and the host of the Copy Closer podcast. Discover what makes people take action and purchase your products and services.
 
Link to the show notes here: https://underdogempowerment.com/116
